p: The proportion of patients in each group requiring changes in systemic therapy for control of chronic GvHD at 3 years after first-line treatment was 17% for the UCB group, 25% for the Haplo/PTCY groups and 39% for the 1-mMUD group, and was significantly lower for the UCB group than for the 1-mMUD group [HR 0.30 (95% CI: 0.1-0.8), P=0.01] ( Figure 4A and Table 3).
